item.title: How i make spells uses runes?
item.dc:creator: @jonaske jonaske
item.description:
@jonaske wrote:

add something like this else if(castSpell == 1162) // low Alch { if(playerLevel[6] >= -21) { if(!playerHasItemAmount(561, 10)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(561, 10)) { alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 5); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[6]), 6); startAnimation(287); playerGfx(5, 0); deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 10); newAnimDelay = 6; newAnim = 712; newAnimRequired = true; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 21) { sendMessage("You need at least 21 Magic to cast Low Level Alchemy"); } }
